# SingleStoreConnectionStringBuilder.SslCert property

The path to the client’s SSL certificate file in PEM format. [`SslKey`](./SslKey.md) must also be specified, and [`CertificateFile`](./CertificateFile.md) should not be.

```csharp
public string SslCert { get; set; }
```
